definitions.definition: The act of rejecting or renouncing something as invalid
definitions.example: The President's renunciation of the treaty has upset Congress.

definitions.definition: The resignation of an ecclesiastical office
definitions.example: The bishop's renunciation was on account of his ill health.

definitions.definition: The act by which a person abandons a right acquired, but without transferring it to another.
In the Anglican baptismal service, the part in which the candidate in person or by his sureties renounces the Devil and all his works.
